name: Amexio card
description: Amexio Card which renders card based on title, body and actions user has configured

properties.name: header
properties.description: User can enable header of card by setting this flag to true..

properties.name: footer
properties.description: User can enable footer of card by setting this flag to true.

properties.name: show
properties.description: User can bind variable to this and hide/unhide card based on requirement..

properties.name: height
properties.description: User can set the height to body..

properties.name: context-menu
properties.description: Context Menu provides the panel on right click(for Array structure: refer typescript code in source tab)

events.name: rightClick
events.description: It is fired when clicked on context menu providing Card node data and selected context menu data.
